about_the_game:
Penny Arcade characters have invaded Dungeon Defenders! You can now play as your favorite Penny Arcade characters, Tycho, Cardboard Tube Samurai, Annarchy, and Jim DarkMagic, in Dungeon Defenders! If you look around hard enough, you might even find your very own cardboard tube sword!

DLC includes:

  • Cardboard Tube Samurai (Monk Class Outfit)
  • Tycho (Squire Class Outfit)
  • Annarchy (Huntress Class Outfit)
  • Jim Darkmagic (Apprentice Class Outfit)
detailed_description:
Penny Arcade characters have invaded Dungeon Defenders! You can now play as your favorite Penny Arcade characters, Tycho, Cardboard Tube Samurai, Annarchy, and Jim DarkMagic, in Dungeon Defenders! If you look around hard enough, you might even find your very own cardboard tube sword!

DLC includes:

  • Cardboard Tube Samurai (Monk Class Outfit)
  • Tycho (Squire Class Outfit)
  • Annarchy (Huntress Class Outfit)
  • Jim Darkmagic (Apprentice Class Outfit)

linux_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Hard disk space: 6 Gb
  • Video Card: ATI Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600, equivalent or greater
  • OpenGL: 2.1

mac_requirements.minimum:
• OS: OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: 1.3 GHz Intel CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 3 GB
  • Video Card: Open GL 2.1 / Shader Model 3 capable graphics card with 256 MB video RAM

  • Graphics:Shader Model 3, 256 MB video memory
  • DirectX®:dx90c

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:2Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3, 512 MB video memory
  • DirectX®:dx90c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectSound-compatible sound device
